name: ctf_correct
label: CTF Correction
description:
Applies CTF corrections on BF-TEM images.

This program adopts the conventions of the following paper:
    
J. A. Mindell and N. Grigorieff 'Accurate determination of local defocus and specimen tilt in electron microscopy'
  
which is the same adopted in FREALIGN, RELION, CTFFIND3/4 and Gctf, among others.

parameters.name: df1
parameters.label:
Defocus 1 (or Defocus U in some notations).
Principal defocus axis. Underfocus is positive.

parameters.name: df2
parameters.label:
Defocus 2 (or Defocus V in some notations).
Defocus axis orthogonal to the U axis. Only mandatory for astigmatic data.
